item.title: Magic Monad Transformer
item.description: Monad-Transformer The code fragment below is from chapter 18 Monad Transform of 1. When the first time I read this example, I was confused with how it is possible to use ask of MonadReader (line 6) and get of MonadState (line 13) functions in the same App Monad content. The only reasonable explanation is that App is both MonadReader and MonadState. While looking at App type definition (line 1), seems it is not possible.
